message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product.  Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,000,000. I'm open to discussing this further.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I would like to propose a lower price of $850,000. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective.  To be fair to both of us, I could come down to $925,000.  This is still a great price considering the value you'll be getting.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I am unable to meet at $925,000. I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $875,000. I believe this strikes a good balance between the value of the product and my budget.
